definition[0]: an adult male animal of the cattle family
example[0]: a herd of cows with one bull
definition[1]: the male of some other large animals such as the elephant or whale
definition[2]: nonsense or something that is completely untrue
definition[3]: an official statement from the Pope
definition[4]: the centre of a target that you are shooting at
definition[5]: someone who buys shares because they expect prices to rise
definition[6]: used to say that you do not believe or agree with what someone has said
example[2]: Bull! Where did you get that idea?
definition[7]: someone who thinks that prices of shares, bonds, currencies, etc are going to rise, and who will therefore keep and buy investments
example[3]: Bulls predict the Dow Jones will go beyond 13,000.
example[4]: A growing group of dollar bulls (=people who think the price of the dollar is going to rise) has kept the dollar on a firm footing.
